title: Allocate shared ride to vehicle automatically
body:
**Scenario**:
Shared rides are displayed in the bottom row (placeholder) after editing and saving.

**Requirement**:
- Shared rides shall be allocated to a vehicle automatically, just like new driving orders are.

title: Mail code page error
body:
The addressee (From) is not represenetd correctly if the name contains special characters (Umlaut).

See "Test Release 3.0.1. Beta.pptx" section 9) Fahraufträge, Rückmeldungen.

Rüegg is written as RÃ1/4egg

title: Daily view drag and drop error
body:
Scenario:
1. drag a ride at the end of a shift to another vehicle
2. drag the ride back to the original location
3. sometimes an error message "keine passende ressourcen" is outputted

The original location has an box-stop immediatly after the ride and more than enough time until the next ride.

title: Find custodian drop-down
body:
See "Test Release 3.0.1. Beta.pptx" section 1) Vormund Suche

The search criteria for a custodian shall be changed
- (from) Anrede Nachname (ID: 3519)
- (  to  ) Nachname, Vorname, Address Zusatz

title: Fix custodian mandatory fields
body:
See "Test Release 3.0.1. Beta.pptx" section 1) Vormund Stammdaten

The mandatory fields "Vorname" (firstName) and "Telefon-Nr" shall be set to optional.

Risk: 
- These fields are NOT NULL in the database and are used (dependancy) for business objects passengers and drivers
- Changing the NOT NULL definitions in the database may have unwanted side effects in these objects.

title: Redundant views
body:
The Application has a conceptional redundancy in the passenger and driver consoles.
![screenshot 2016-12-22 13 46 56](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/21426335/a8c75720-c84e-11e6-8bd0-d098b50895d9.png)

Expectation:
- the console view and edit view shall display the same data but does not, two different views (redundant).
- replace Details-View with the Edit-View (readonly).

title: Protect freezing shift, driving pools & missions
body:
Freezing the shift and its driving pools is done AFTER freezing all driving missions in the shift.

**Risk**:
Optimization can be started by another user during the freeze actions, the freezing actions may be compromized if the freeze action is not protected (BEGIN TRANSACTION - COMMIT).

![k14479000](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/19019544/21d92272-888c-11e6-9c5c-618b525d116f.jpg)

title: OVI Comment for Driving Config is missing
body:
Comments for Driving Configs are sourced in:
- driving orders
- passengers
- points of interest (poi)

However, the comments in pois are not written to the driving config:
![bildschirmfoto 2016-08-26 um 10 21 35](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/17998971/4cd38b84-6b77-11e6-8d70-ae7d56e5e7c7.png)

Expectation:
- "Bemerkung im OVI" should also be there, but isn't

title: Postal code not persisted properly
body:
Scenario:
- Zürich airport.
- In OVI (poi).

Screenshot (open POI):
![bildschirmfoto 2016-08-23 um 18 48 26](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/17901170/907983fa-6962-11e6-8126-3d5e9a686951.png)

Screenshot (save POI):
![bildschirmfoto 2016-08-23 um 18 48 50](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/17901193/a991c258-6962-11e6-945e-a6363cae003c.png)

Expectation:
- The postal code must be persisted, instead it reverts to the address without postal code.

title: Hard to fix "wrong vehicle allocated to driver"
body:
**Scenario**: 
- One or more drivers do not want to drive with the allocated vehicle.
- Typically this is the Opel Movano, a big vehicle, not everyone likes it.
- No positive information provided about driver preferences, only negative.

**Expectation**:
- Information about driver preferences (positive) should be provided on the same page.

Screenshot, daily view:
![bildschirmfoto 2016-08-23 um 18 39 23](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/17900819/1924d378-6961-11e6-860e-23c1b9b43df2.png)

Screenshot, monthly plan:
![bildschirmfoto 2016-08-23 um 18 40 22](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/17900842/2c304bfa-6961-11e6-8de4-d690f2fe4d54.png)

title: Extra Minutes not added to ride time
body:
The extera minutes in the order form are not added to the service time in the driving mission.

![noextramin](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/17516771/a8486320-5e40-11e6-907d-706c546cc2de.PNG)

Bug: Reported by TIXIZUG, Monika Rüegg

title: Long-distance doesn't display red box
body:
Scenario:
-long-distance trip
-passenger doesn't like VW Caddy
-ride is allocated to a VW Caddy

![fernnocaddy](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/17516618/d4474ab4-5e3f-11e6-9d19-98a0cbe90a33.png)

Expectation:
-the border line should display as red

Hunch:
-the order of colors in css

title: Long distance ride, wrong error message for repeated order
body:
![errorfernfahrt](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/17516023/4aa293d4-5e3c-11e6-8e2f-bc1053be0c4b.PNG)

Expectation:
-red maske with error message
-long distance rides are not allowed in repeated driving orders.

Bug: reported by TIXIZUG, Monika Rüegg

title: Long distance rides, not tested for overlapping rides with same passenger
body:
If a new ride is created, then all other (overlapping) rides are tested for the same passenger.

-This works between normal rides
-This works between normal and long distance rides
-But not between long-distance rides

Bug detected by TIXIZUG, Monika Rüegg.

title: Shared ride not recalculated, if participant(s) cancels order(s).
body:
Shared rides are composed of two (or more) orders from two (or more) different passengers.
The total kilometers and duration is based upon the route taken plus boarding / deboarding times.

**Expectation**:
If one (or more) participients cancel the ride, the driving mission should be recalculated (but isn't).

title: Restore database function doesn't support MYSQLDUMP files
body:
The restore database function doesn't restore the tixizug migration files:
- database not loaded
- errors not returned to the calling app

![resetorebutton](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/16221260/202b9dd8-3792-11e6-813b-cd135a833324.png)

This is not a production function, it can be removed. This will ensure that only support can restore databases using linux utilities,

title: Repeated driving order id not displayed in GUI
body:
![repeateddrivingorderid](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/15813121/8e05b668-2bbc-11e6-8d9a-3c7a35b06a3b.PNG)

**Expectation**:
Displayed in header (marked yellow), or "behind" the information button.
Displayed ad "Dauerauftrag-Id", read only.

title: Production server WSOD
body:
The production server displays a WSOD (white screen of death) 1 minute 32 seconds after starting the optimization of a page with 20 vehicles, 3 shifts loaded to 150%:

**Screenshot** WSOD:
![bildschirmfoto 2016-05-04 um 11 29 12](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/15010368/f6cc9558-11eb-11e6-9cd5-a998501c099f.png)

**Screenshot** daily plan, after WSOD:
![bildschirmfoto 2016-05-04 um 08 59 34](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/15010387/0bc5927a-11ec-11e6-8fd8-aa086571be39.png)

**References**: google Symfony WSOD

title: Volatile Zoom in daily view
body:
When the Zoom is active in the daily view, it is reset to the default after the first refresh (F5) after 60 seconds of inactivity.

Expectancy: stays the same unteil changed again.

Requirement: Monika Ruegg, TIXIZUG

title: Shift property "amountOfDrivers" is redundant
body:
Shift property "amountOfDrivers" should be replaced by function $shift->getDrivingPools->count().

![amountofdrivers](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/13769911/843b67e2-ea83-11e5-9052-f9d68b9f5e0e.PNG)

Expectation:
Data model should only contain objects and attributes that are really needed and used.

title: Optimizing: resource restrictions not respected
body:
**Scenario**: 
1. Add a driving order for one person with 6 (or more) companions. 
2. No vehicles (in the database) have this many passenger seats.
3. Open the corresponding daily plan with tis driving order.
4. Click on the Optimize-Button.
5. The driving order is allocated to a vehicle (which doesn't have enough resources)

**Expectation**:
The driving order is not honored, it has the status "overbooked" and is displayed in the bottom line (placeholder). Maybe even with a error message or a flash message.

title: Change management: deleting a passenger should cascade to dependant children.
body:
When a passenger is deleted, the (repeated) driving orders remain.
The passenger is no longer available in the GUI, the (repetad) orders neither.

Expectation:
Deleting passengers should cascade to dependant children.

title: TWIG release 2.0 expected soon (DEPRECIATED items)
body:
Release plan: "expected soon" (written August 2015)
![twigdepreciated](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/9734957/806c21e6-5637-11e5-9f58-d1135608dbd6.PNG)

title: Concept - Routes: should not be unique for start+target
body:
Routes are modeled to be unique for any start+target address ids. This implies, that distance and duration between any two locations is constant over time. This is a conceptual error:

![roadconstruction](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/7774023/84ba7c28-00a8-11e5-8282-0ab4b94cb80e.jpg)
Roads are changing all the time, being built and/ or closed. Speed limits are changing more often than not. Maps change every day ...

**Expectation**:
Any start+target combination is only unique for one day, after that the same route can exist with different attributes.

title: Address inflation while building a new route.
body:
Building a driving order (from, to, etc) creates a new route object and also new address objects (2).
Example:
![auftrage](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/6980682/03c507a6-d9f6-11e4-8edd-f42f5042723b.png)

This causes the following google type addresses to be persisted in the database twice:
![addressinflation](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/6980690/206778d0-d9f6-11e4-97a9-2e43e6af0d2f.PNG)

Expectation:
Before including an address in the database: 
- test if the address is already there.
- no: add the new address, return new id
- yes: return the id of the existing address 

This avoids an address inflation, which will slow down the backup and reduce database performance.

title: Cannot change zone name
body:
Scenario: 
Changing the zone name "Angrenzend" to "angrenzend" will cause a validation error.

![zoneeditieren](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4991526/4882139/0f66ac24-6352-11e4-8955-06c6701575f7.PNG)

Expectation:
The zone name shall be allowed to change to any other value, even the same as another zone name (GIGO principal). The implementation is too restrictive, this was not required.

title: Fahrzeugdepot, add postalcode to list
body:
Fahrzeugdepots können nicht erfasst / bearbeitet / gespeichert werden!
- Snapshot-1 zeigt: Depotname -> Strasse.(mit Punkt) Nr. -> Ort
  gewünscht wird :                     ->  Strasse Nr -> PLZ -> Ort

![snapshot-1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7513352/3748195/128d7384-17d9-11e4-8bd1-e2f6b0facdae.PNG)
- Snapshot-2 zeigt: Depotname \* -> Strasse Nr *
  gewünscht wird:   Depotname \* -> Strasse Nr \* -> PLZ Ort *
- Daten müssen ausgewählt werden können

![snapshot-2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7513352/3748242/e15aeeda-17d9-11e4-99fa-af2e73a9e58b.PNG)
